sentences.en: Also aiming at the features of the system, some feasible anti - interference measures are liken.
sentences.cn: 并针对系统的工作特点, 采取了实用可行的抗干扰措施.

sentences.en: And again He said, To what shall I liken the kingdom of God?
sentences.cn: 20?又说, 我可把神的国比作 什么 ?

sentences.en: And again he said, Whereunto shall I liken the kingdom of God?
sentences.cn: 20又说, 我拿什么来比神的国 呢 .

sentences.en: I can only liken current experience to a terrible dream.
sentences.cn: 我只能把这次经历比作一场恶梦.

sentences.en: I liken you, my darling , to a mare harnessed to one of the chariots of Pharaoh.
sentences.cn: 9我的佳偶, 我将你比法老车上套的骏马.

sentences.en: In its hydrodynamic behavior, we can liken the dense phase to a liquid.
sentences.cn: 从其流体动力学性状来看, 可把密相看作近似乎液体.

sentences.en: Liken and derive the characteristic with the vivid, concrete, image of justice.
sentences.cn: 比喻派生义具有生动 、 具体 、 形象的特点.

sentences.en: Lk. 13:20 And again He said, To what shall I liken the kingdom of God?
sentences.cn: 路十三20他又说, 我可把神的国比作 什么 ?

sentences.en: Others liken it to a country club.
sentences.cn: 而其他人则把它比作乡村俱乐部.

sentences.en: The Hunter you could liken to the prototypical Ranger.
sentences.cn: 你们可以把猎人看成游侠.

sentences.en: They liken the standard for scientific evidence to that for other evidence.
sentences.cn: 它们将科学证据标准与其他标准相比较.

sentences.en: To consider or describe as similar. equal. or analogous, liken.
sentences.cn: 考虑或描述为相似. 相等或类似的, 把-比喻成.

sentences.en: To whom then will you liken God ? Or what likeness will you compare with Him?
sentences.cn: 赛40:18你们究竟将谁比神、用甚麽形像与神比较 呢 .

sentences.en: We often liken the heart to a pump.
sentences.cn: 我们常把心脏比拟为水泵.

sentences.en: Whether you liken yourself a towering tree or a blade of grass.
sentences.cn: 无论你想你自己成为一棵大树还是一片绿草.

trans.tran_en: If you liken one thing or person to another thing or person, you say that they are similar
